content: simply a gnome skill level easy you need red blue and tan cotton worsted-weight yarn like sugar n cream size g us crochet hook scrap of white felt two 6 mm safety eyes polyfill or pellets or beans for filling gnome body with red cotton yarn round 1 6 single_crochet in loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet 6 6 sts round 3 increase single_crochet 1 repeat 3 times 9 sts round 4 single_crochet 9 round 5 increase single_crochet 2 repeat 3 times 12 sts round 6 single_crochet 12 round 7 increase single_crochet 3 repeat 3 times 15 sts round 8 single_crochet 15 round 9 increase single_crochet 4 repeat 3 times 18 sts round 10 single_crochet 18 round 11 increase single_crochet 5 repeat 3 times 21 sts round 12 single_crochet 21 round 13 increase single_crochet 6 repeat 3 times 24 sts change to tan yarn round 14 single_crochet 24 round 15 increase single_crochet 7 repeat 3 times 27 sts round 16 single_crochet 27 round 17 increase single_crochet 8 repeat 3 times 30 sts change to blue yarn round 18 single_crochet 30 round 19 increase single_crochet 9 repeat 3 times 33 sts round 20 single_crochet 33 round 21 increase single_crochet 10 repeat 3 times 36 sts round 22 single_crochet 36 round 23 increase single_crochet 11 repeat 3 times 39 sts round 24 single_crochet all around 39 sts slip_stitch in next st fasten_off attach eyes using pattern cut out a beard from white felt sew onto face gnome bottom with blue cotton yarn round 1 6 single_crochet in loop 6 sts round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3 increase single_crochet 1 repeat 6 times 18 sts round 4 increase single_crochet 2 repeat 6 times 24 sts round 5 increase single_crochet 3 repeat 6 times 30 sts round 6 increase single_crochet 4 repeat 6 times 36 sts round 7 increase single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 5 single_crochet 6 increase single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 5 single_crochet 6 40 sts slip_stitch in next st fasten_off sew bottom to gnome body matching stitch for stitch about 2/3 of way around stuff firmly with polyfill or pellets finish sewing around and fasten_off play simply a gnome ©2007 else m tennessen http //bellasartes blogspot com make for yourself but do not sell do not copy and distribute or sell this pattern thanks for respecting copyright
